rows.label: tlk41200121_04_msg0001
rows.name:
So you're the new owner of
Cmalaf Artwork!

rows.label: tlk41200121_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Why did you decide to become
the owner?

rows.label: tlk41200121_04_msg0006
rows.name:
You can get stronger by becoming an owner?
I see...

rows.label: tlk41200121_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Then if you become the owner of lots of shops,
you can get even stronger.

rows.label: tlk41200121_04_msg0008
rows.name:
...But that means you don't actually
care about the art or the shop, right?

rows.label: tlk41200121_04_msg0009
rows.name:
I feel a little sorry for
Peline-san...

rows.label: tlk41200121_04_msg0011
rows.name:
Peline-san was really happy, you know.
She said she was glad that someone who loves
art became the owner.

rows.label: tlk41200121_04_msg0012
rows.name: You really should say that, even if it's a lie.
